original_text: He had a bronze helmet on his head and wore a coat of scale armor of bronze weighing five thousand shekels;
korean_text: 머리에는 놋 투구를 썼고 몸에는 비늘 갑옷을 입었으니 그 갑옷의 무게가 놋 오천 세겔이며

sentences.original_text: He had a bronze helmet on his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 머리에 청동 투구를 쓰고 있었고

sentences.original_text: and wore a coat of scale armor of bronze
